messages.subject: Re: [SHQ] NHK Shisnengumi wins  awards!
messages.msgSnippet: thanks a lot! XD ktamae@**** wrote: NHK Akesato isn t as gorgeous as PMK or other version which portrayed Akesato as a courtesan. Because NHK Akesato is a
messages.messageBody:
thanks a lot! XD

ktamae@... wrote:
NHK Akesato isn't as gorgeous as PMK or other version which portrayed
Akesato as a courtesan. Because NHK Akesato is a simple whore.
Personally I was surprised to see such Akesato at first but finally I
thought her simple and frank character was what Yamanami needed and Sawa
Suzuki played her very well.
She appears in the episode 31 to 33.

I put some link from NHK official site but I warn that thre are some
spoiler photos.

You can see Akesato here.
http://www3.nhk.or.jp/taiga/topic/yamanami/point.html

And here clicking the number 3.
http://www3.nhk.or.jp/taiga/topic/yamanami/docu.html

This is the top page of Yamanami featured topics for his fans.
http://www3.nhk.or.jp/taiga/topic/yamanami/index.html

Tama

Saitoh Worship wrote:

>
> Ummm, does anyone happen to have a picture of Akesato in NHK? I sort
> of missed the episodes involving her and I really want to see what she
> looked like ^^;;; Thanks a bunch! XD XD XD *wonders if she's as
> gorgeous as the PMK Akesato*
>

messages.subject: Re: [SHQ] NHK Shisnengumi wins  awards!
messages.msgSnippet: NHK Akesato isn t as gorgeous as PMK or other version which portrayed Akesato as a courtesan. Because NHK Akesato is a simple whore. Personally I was surprised
messages.messageBody:
NHK Akesato isn't as gorgeous as PMK or other version which portrayed
Akesato as a courtesan. Because NHK Akesato is a simple whore.
Personally I was surprised to see such Akesato at first but finally I
thought her simple and frank character was what Yamanami needed and Sawa
Suzuki played her very well.
She appears in the episode 31 to 33.

I put some link from NHK official site but I warn that thre are some
spoiler photos.

You can see Akesato here.
http://www3.nhk.or.jp/taiga/topic/yamanami/point.html

And here clicking the number 3.
http://www3.nhk.or.jp/taiga/topic/yamanami/docu.html

This is the top page of Yamanami featured topics for his fans.
http://www3.nhk.or.jp/taiga/topic/yamanami/index.html

Tama

Saitoh Worship wrote:

>
> Ummm, does anyone happen to have a picture of Akesato in NHK? I sort
> of missed the episodes involving her and I really want to see what she
> looked like ^^;;; Thanks a bunch! XD XD XD *wonders if she's as
> gorgeous as the PMK Akesato*
>

Ummm, does anyone happen to have a picture of Akesato in NHK? I sort of missed the episodes involving her and I really want to see what she looked like ^^;;; Thanks a bunch! XD XD XD *wonders if she's as gorgeous as the PMK Akesato*

BarbaraSheridan <bsher213@...> wrote:This came across the NHKShinsengumi list thought I'd pass it along....



[8th Nikkan Sports Drama Award ~July-September 2004]


BEST DRAMA
1 Shinsengumi! - 5289 votes - NHK
2 Last Present - 3668 votes - NTV
3 Sekai no Chuushin de, Ai wo Sakebu - 2494 votes - TBS
4 TOBOSHA - 2357 votes - TBS
5 Ningen no Shoumei - 1907 votes - FujiTV


BEST MALE LEAD
1 Katori Shingo (Kondou) - 8116 votes - Shinsengumi! - NHK
2 Takayuki Yamada - 4046 votes - Sekai no Chuushin de, Ai wo Sakebu -
TBS
3 Yousuke Eguchi - 3058 votes - TOBOSHA - TBS
4 Takenouchi Yutaka - 2578 votes - Ningen no Shoumei - FujiTV
5 Sasaki Kuranosuke - 2401 votes - Last Present - NTV


BEST SUPPORTING MALE
1 Kazunari Ninomiya - 7185 votes - Minami-kun no Koibito - TV Asahi
2 Sakai Masato (Yamanami) - 2327 votes - Shinsengumi! - NHK
3 Yamamoto Kouji (Hijikata) - 1918 votes - Shinsengumi! - NHK
4 Fujiwara Tatsuya (Okita) - 1787 votes - Shinsengumi! - NHK
5 Hiroshi Abe - 1566 votes - TOBOSHA - TBS


BEST SUPPORTING FEMALE
1 Ishihara Satomi - 1829 votes - Waterboys 2 - FujiTV
..................
8 Suzuki Sawa (Akesato) - 552 votes - Shinsengumi! - NHK
9 Tabata Tomoko (Tsune) - 509 votes - Shinsengumi! - NHK
10 Maya Miki - 449 votes - Batsu Kare - TBS


Source:
http://www.nikkansports.com/ns/entertainment/drama_gp/2004/dgp_kekka0
41016.html

--
Barbara Sheridan

TBS

5 Sasaki Kuranosuke - 2401 votes - Last Present - NTV

2 Sakai Masato (Yamanami) - 2327 votes - Shinsengumi! - NHK
3 Yamamoto Kouji (Hijikata) - 1918 votes - Shinsengumi! - NHK
